elphem.electron.electron module

class elphem.electron.electron.Electron(lattice: Lattice, n_electrons: int)[source]

Bases: object

Represents free electrons in a given empty lattice.

lattice

Lattice on which the free electron model is applied.

Type:

Lattice

n_electrons

Number of electrons per unit cell.

Type:

int

n_bands

Number of energy bands considered.

Type:

int

n_k

Number of k_points.

Type:

int

g

Reciprocal lattice vectors.

Type:

np.ndarray

k

Vectors in the reciprocal space.

Type:

np.ndarray

eigenenergies

Eigenenergies of free electron model.

Type:

np.ndarray

fermi_energy

Fermi energy

Type:

float

calculate_dos(omega: float | ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Calculate DOS by using analytical forms.

Parameters:

omega (float | np.ndarray) – frequencies

Returns:

DOS

Return type:

np.ndarray

calculate_eigenenergies(k_array: ndarray, g_array: ndarray | None = None) → ndarray[source]

Calculate the electron eigenenergies at wave vector k.

Parameters:

  • g_array (np.ndarray) – Reciprocal lattice vectors

Returns:

The electron eigenenergies
